about_the_game:
Mythos Interactive Game Collection is a curated anthology of 9 diverse and captivating indie games, brought to you by the creative minds at Mythos Interactive. This collection showcases the studio's unique approach to game design, offering a variety of genres and experiences that cater to all types of players.

Whether you're seeking the thrill of fast-paced action, the challenge of mind-bending puzzles, or the joy of immersive storytelling, the Mythos Interactive Game Collection has something for everyone. Each title is a labor of love, crafted with attention to detail and a passion for innovation, ensuring hours of entertainment and discovery.

Key Features:

  • 9 Unique Games: Dive into a wide range of genres, including action, puzzle, adventure, and more. Each game offers a distinct experience, with its own unique mechanics, art style, and narrative.

  • Engaging Gameplay: From strategic challenges to heart-pounding action, these games are designed to keep you engaged, whether you prefer solo play or competitive fun.

  • Creative Freedom: Explore worlds and stories brought to life by passionate developers, with original concepts and fresh takes on classic genres.

  • Indie Spirit: Support an indie studio dedicated to pushing the boundaries of game design and delivering high-quality experiences without the constraints of mainstream development.

hether you're a long-time fan of Mythos Interactive or discovering their games for the first time, this collection is a must-have for any gaming enthusiast. Join the adventure, explore new worlds, and experience the magic of indie game development with the Mythos Interactive Game Collection!

Game Included in this collection:

  • Hefty Heights - Test your stacking skills and precision as you carefully balance everyday objects to hit the perfect weight. Every move counts in this thrilling challenge of balance and strategy!

  • To The Last - Dice are your biggest weapon. The Dice-slinger is a fearsome cowboy who uses magical dice as ammunition. Reload your shotgun with dice and blast your demonic enemies right back to Hell, but be warned, if you run out of dice, it's Game Over.

  • 25 Vikings - Fight to the bitter, icy end as you control a clan of desperate Vikings captured by the hordes of Helheim. Brave the cold and free your warrior brothers and sisters as you battle the enemies of the All Father.

  • Internal Medicine - Play as a young professional in the medical industry as she struggles with the taking care of her ailing patients, while attempting to maintain a modicum of sanity.

  • The Case of the Deviant Detective - Follow the case work of Charlie, a new detective on the force, whose Uncle happens to be a part of the mafia, and needs a few favors. Are you ready to REWIND the tapes in this puzzling Noir mystery, and set the fate of these suspects forever?

  • Runaway Robot - Aid a mad scientist as he attempts to regain control of an army of little robots. Help these little robots find their way in the world. Test your smarts in this cute and cuddly robotic adventure! What could go wrong?

  • Terminal Charge - Take on the role of a desperate air-traveler as they zig-zag through a bustling airport while attempting to reach their gate and keep their phone alive. Rush from outlet to outlet and evade your fellow pedestrians as you make your way to your gate. But beware, gate changes are frequent and this airport was built by a madman!

  • Kinoko Dash - A short, fast-paced casual game about clicking and dashing around while chopping angry mushroom enemies into tiny bits. Keep your enemies at a distance while timing your clicks just right to execute a SUPER DASH!

  • Prepare to Re-Pair! - Help these cute robot friends find their way back together in this charming and hectic puzzle action game.

name: Mythos Interactive Game Collection

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Anything modern
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Ears

short_description: Mythos Interactive Game Collection is a diverse anthology of 9 indie games, each offering unique gameplay experiences across various genres. From thrilling action to mind-bending puzzles, this collection showcases the creative spirit of Mythos Interactive.
